item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-06-12
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at Washington Square Tavern (714 Washington St, at Beacon St, Brookline). #
  • I'm at Diesel Cafe (257 Elm St, at Chester St, Somerville) w/ 3 others. #
  • Was walking around Davis square with puppy when the sky opened up. Now have a wet dog sulking in the backseat. #
  • Oil spill bad news for Tea Party, makes government activism look good. (Boston Globe) (via @ebertchicago) (via @zeldman) #
  • Grad Nite Loses Its Luster #

Powered by Twitter Tools
